1.text: Log into the Messenger app with your Facebook account.

2.vid: /9/9b/Create a Group Chat on Facebook Step 2 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Add a person to the conversation.
3.vid: /e/e5/Create a Group Chat on Facebook Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Add more people to create a group conversation.
4.vid: /4/44/Create a Group Chat on Facebook Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

5.text: Type your message that you want to send to the group.
5.vid: /e/e9/Create a Group Chat on Facebook Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Send the message when you're satisfied with it.
6.vid: /5/59/Create a Group Chat on Facebook Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Change the name of a group conversation.
7.vid: /1/1d/Create a Group Chat on Facebook Step 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Log into the Facebook website with your Facebook account.
8.vid: /1/1a/Create a Group Chat on Facebook Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Click the "New Message" button in the lower-right corner.
9.vid: /4/41/Create a Group Chat on Facebook Step 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Add the people you want to start a group chat with.
10.vid: /1/10/Create a Group Chat on Facebook Step 10.360p.mp4

11.vid: /5/51/Create a Group Chat on Facebook Step 11.360p.mp4
